definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: Chanel foundation creates the most perfect skin tone.
sentences.chinese: 香奈儿粉底液，打点出最完美的肤色。

sentences.english: Chanel lady's cheeks inflate like a bicycle tyre.
sentences.chinese: 香奈儿女士的脸像自行车轮胎一样膨胀起来。

sentences.english: Claudia Schiffer appears in her first runway show, modelling Chanel.
sentences.chinese: 克劳迪娅希弗在香奈儿的T台上完成了第一次走秀。

sentences.english: opposed to buying something from Chanel or Armani, you know, very expensive name brands.
sentences.chinese: 和香奈儿和阿玛尼购物相比，这些都是很昂贵的品牌。

sentences.english: The famous Chanel logo of two intertwined Cs is based on her initials.
sentences.chinese: 著名的香奈儿双C交叠商标即来自她的姓名字首。

sentences.english: His contracts with Chanel and Fendi are for life.
sentences.chinese: 而他与香奈儿和芬迪的合约都是无限期的。

sentences.english: And she's also showed off an impressive collection of Chanel and Hermes bags.
sentences.chinese: 她还炫耀了香奈儿和爱马仕的名包收藏。

definition: bag or purse etc/small bump or pimple/hillock
Van Cleef & Arpels (French luxury jewelry company)
